module.name: Backup & Restore
module.description: Provides Backup & Restore capabilities for your PBX
module.changelog: *12.0.18* #8170, #9525, #9550 bugfixes *12.0.17* Fix symlink issues when backing up and restoring. *12.0.16* Description Change *12.0.15* Massively speed up restore *12.0.14.2* Ensure that HA tables are never restored. *12.0.13* FREEPBX-8562 Fix NAT regression *12.0.12* FREEPBX-8563 Have backup email pull from sysadmin from is sysadmin exist *12.0.11* FREEPBX-8501 active / passive selection on ftp backup server *12.0.10* FREEPBX-8112 - Trigger sysadmin hooks, if present. *12.0.9* FREEPBX-8045 - onclick won't bind to new elements being added to the DOM *12.0.8* FREEPBX-8059 Re-fix. *12.0.7* FREEPBX-8059 *12.0.6* FREEPBX-5690 and FREEPBX-6978 *12.0.5* FREEPBX-7896 Backup email missing from Advanced Settings *12.0.4* FREEPBX-7842
